title: How does missing health damage work against Kled?
body: Are the two healths considered seperate or together?

replies.body: Together. That's also one of the reasons they're shown as one bar, rather than two separate ones.

I suppose this isn't completely relevant, but it's as good a time to ask as any.
Will we ever see a champ with 2 health bars, or as two seperate entities?
I remember reading a post saying how entity selection in, say, DotA is different to League, which is why we're unlikely to receive a dual-type champion, and I'm curious to know if that's still the case.

good question... I assume one considering you do do kled hp  til you knocked him off his lizard so its like one hp bar but the concept is he has two forms kinda like gnar but through his hp
